content: the rustic pines beanie is a fitted crochet beanie with lots of texture this hat has a fun new stitch combo along with some classic stitches together to create a modern cozy beanie this pattern is written for worsted weight yarn in baby-adult size be sure to check out the coordinating cowl pattern by @craftingforweeks or ear warmer and mittens by @theplushpineapple pattern includes link to stitch tutorial video for pine stitch
